name: organisation_name
label: Please select your organisation:

name: enumerator_id
label: Name of enumerator or ID

name: enumerator_name
label: The holder of this id is ${pull_name}, if this is not your name please go back and select the appropriate id

name: Mantika
label: Mantika (Admin 2):

name: Baladiya
label: Baladiya (Admin 3):

name: area_code
label: Please select the area code you are currently doing the survey

name: point_code
label: Please select the the point code you are interviewing
hint::English (en): Look in the app My Maps (id_XXX)

name: geolocation
label: Please take the GPS coordinates of the survey location

name: introduction_paragraph
label: Hi, my name is ${pull_name} I am working with ${organisation_name} on behalf of a project from ACTED, an international organisation based in Libya.  We are conducting a survey to provide current information on critical needs and priorities for humanitarian actors supporting vulnerable communities across Libya. We value your participation in this survey which should take approximately 30 minutes to conduct. Many thanks in advance for your cooperation.

name: consent
label: Do you consent participating in this survey?

name: consented
label: consented

name: bio_data
label: Bio Data

name: displacement_status
label: What is the displacement status of most members of this household?

name: HoH
label: Is the interviewee the head of household?

name: relation_HoH
label: If no, what is the relationship to the head of household?

name: age_HoH
label: How old is the head of the household?
constraint_message::English (en): Head of Household needs to be above 18
hint::English (en): Please put the number 99 if the interviewee did not want to answer

name: sex_HoH
label: What is the sex of the head of household?
constraint_message::English (en): If relation to HoH is wife, sex HoH female cannot be selected, If relation to HoH is husband, sex HoH male cannot be selected

name: nb_ind_hh
label: How many people live in your household ? (including the interviewee and hosted people economically dependent upon you)
constraint_message::English (en): Minimum 1 person, if the interviewee is not the HoH then Minimum 2

name: hh_roster_male
label: Please tell me how many males there are of the following in your household ?
hint::English (en): Write 0 if there are no individuals in a category

name: nb_infants_male
label: Infants 0-5years:
constraint_message::English (en): Value must be between 0 and 20

name: nb_children_male
label: Children 6-14 years:
constraint_message::English (en): Value must be between 0 and 20

name: nb_youth_male
label: Youth 15-17 years:
constraint_message::English (en): Value must be between 0 and 20

name: nb_adults_male
label: Adults 18-64:
constraint_message::English (en): Can't be zero, the head of household is an adult

name: nb_elderly_male
label: Elderly 65+ years:
constraint_message::English (en): Can't be zero, the head of household is an elderly

name: hh_roster_female
label: Please tell me how many female there are of the following in your household ?
hint::English (en): Write 0 if there are no individuals in a category

name: nb_infants_female
label: Infants 0-5years:
constraint_message::English (en): Value must be between 0 and 20

name: nb_children_female
label: Children 6-14 years:
constraint_message::English (en): Value must be between 0 and 20

name: nb_youth_female
label: Youth 15-17 years:
constraint_message::English (en): Value must be between 0 and 20

name: nb_adults_female
label: Adults 18-64:
constraint_message::English (en): Can't be zero, the head of household is an adult

name: nb_elderly_female
label: Elderly 65+ years:
constraint_message::English (en): Can't be zero, the head of household is an elderly

name: error
label: The total number of individuals mentioned here is not equal to the one you mentioned earlier

name: hosting_displaced
label: Are you currently hosting family members or others that have been displaced from another place in the mantika or Libya?

name: nb_displaced_hosted
label: If yes, how many?
constraint_message::English (en): number of hosted members can't exceed the total household members

name: nb_minordisplaced_hosted
label: If yes, how many hosted persons are under 18?
constraint_message::English (en): number of under 18 hosted people can't exceed the number of total hosted people
hint::English (en): Please put the number 99 if the interviewee did not want to answer

name: nb_minor_unaccompanied
label: How many children in your household do not have any family relationship to any adult member of the household?
hint::English (en): Please put the number 99 if the interviewee did not want to answer

name: food_security
label: Food Security

name: food_consumption
label: In the past 7 days, on how many days have the members of your household eaten the following food items? Integer from 0 to 7 for each sub-question

name: cereals
label: 1. Cereals, grains, and tubers (including wheat bread, pasta, rice, couscous, potatoes, etc.)
constraint_message::English (en): Value must be between 0 and 7
hint::English (en): Please put the number 99 if the interviewee did not want to answer

name: legumes
label: 2. Legumes and nuts (including beans, chickpeas, peas, nuts, etc.)
constraint_message::English (en): Value must be between 0 and 7
hint::English (en): Please put the number 99 if the interviewee did not want to answer

name: dairy
label: 3. Milk and dairy products (including milk, cheese, sour cream, yoghurt, etc.)
constraint_message::English (en): Value must be between 0 and 7
hint::English (en): Please put the number 99 if the interviewee did not want to answer

name: meat
label: 4. Eggs, meat, fish (including beef, chicken, lamb, canned fish, fresh fish, etc.)
constraint_message::English (en): Value must be between 0 and 7
hint::English (en): Please put the number 99 if the interviewee did not want to answer

name: veggies
label: 5. Vegetables and leaves (including onions, lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, red peppers, spinach, etc.)
constraint_message::English (en): Value must be between 0 and 7
hint::English (en): Please put the number 99 if the interviewee did not want to answer

name: fruits
label: 6. Fruits (including bananas, apples, cherries, dates, lemons, apricots, pears, etc.)
constraint_message::English (en): Value must be between 0 and 7
hint::English (en): Please put the number 99 if the interviewee did not want to answer

name: fats
label: 7. Oil and fat (including vegetable oil, butter, margarine, lard, etc.)
constraint_message::English (en): Value must be between 0 and 7
hint::English (en): Please put the number 99 if the interviewee did not want to answer

name: sugar
label: 8. Sugar and sweets (including sugar, honey, jam, cakes, cookies, sweets, sugary drinks, etc.)
constraint_message::English (en): Value must be between 0 and 7
hint::English (en): Please put the number 99 if the interviewee did not want to answer

name: condiments
label: 9. Condiments and spices (including garlic, tomato paste, and small quantities of items from other food groups)
constraint_message::English (en): Value must be between 0 and 7
hint::English (en): Please put the number 99 if the interviewee did not want to answer

name: food_source
label: What are the top three sources from which your household typically acquires food?
constraint: not(selected(., 'dk')) and not(selected(., 'dwta')) and count-selected(.)<=3 or count-selected(.) = 1
constraint_message::English (en): Choose 3 options maximum

name: food_source_other
label: Other:

name: food_coping
label: In the past 7 days, if there have been times when you did not have enough food or money to buy food, on how many days has your household had to: (Integer from 0 to 7 for each sub-question)

name: less_expensive_quality
label: 1. Rely on less preferred, less expensive food?
constraint_message::English (en): Value must be between 0 and 7
hint::English (en): Please put the number 99 if the interviewee did not want to answer

name: borrow_relatives
label: 2. Borrow food or rely on help from friends or relatives?
constraint_message::English (en): Value must be between 0 and 7
hint::English (en): Please put the number 99 if the interviewee did not want to answer

name: reduce_number_meals
label: 3. Reduce the number of meals eaten per day?
constraint_message::English (en): Value must be between 0 and 7
hint::English (en): Please put the number 99 if the interviewee did not want to answer

name: shrink_meals
label: 4. Reduce the size of portions or meals?
constraint_message::English (en): Value must be between 0 and 7
hint::English (en): Please put the number 99 if the interviewee did not want to answer

name: reduce_adult
label: 5. Reduce the quantity consumed by adults so children could eat?
constraint_message::English (en): Value must be between 0 and 7
hint::English (en): Please put the number 99 if the interviewee did not want to answer

name: agricultural_production
label: Is your household currently engaged in any form of agricultural production (for example, crop farming, gardening, raising livestock, fishing, etc.)?
constraint_message::English (en): the option "No" can't be selected with other options and can't be selected when the food source os "own production"

name: agricultural_production_other
label: If other, Please specify

name: usage_prod_food
label: If answer is not "No": Do you do this for income generation or for your household's own consumption?
constraint_message::English (en): When one of food sources is "own production" the option "household own consumption" must be selected

name: access_land_sea
label: If "No": Does your household currently have access to land or to the sea to engage in such activities?

name: engage_agriculture_prior2014
label: If "No": Did your household engage in such activities prior to 2014 but had to give them up?

name: crops_grown
label:
If "Yes, in crop farming or gardening":
What are the main crops your household currently grows?

name: crops_grown_other
label: If other, Please specify

name: nb_hectares_cultivated
label:
If "Yes, in crop farming or gardening":
How much land does your household cultivate in hectares?

name: nb_others_employed
label:
If "Yes, in crop farming or gardening":
How many individuals, if any, did your household employ to support production in the last 12 months, including seasonal workers?
hint::English (en): If none, enter 0

name: crop_crisis
label:
If "Yes, in crop farming or gardening":
How has the current crisis affected your crop production, if at all?
constraint_message::English (en): the option "Production has not been negatively affected" can't be selected with other options

name: crop_crisis_other
label: If other, Please specify

name: nb_animals
label:
If "Yes, in raising livestock":
How many of each type of animal does your household currently own?

label: 1. Cows

name: donkeys_horses
label: 2. Donkeys and horses
hint::English (en): If none, enter 0

name: sheep
label: 3. Sheep
hint::English (en): If none, enter 0

name: goats
label: 4. Goats
hint::English (en): If none, enter 0

name: poultry
label: 5. Poultry
hint::English (en): If none, enter 0

name: camels
label: 6. Camels
hint::English (en): If none, enter 0

name: other_animals
label: 7. Other (please specify)
hint::English (en): If none, enter 0

name: nb_animals_other
label: If other, Please specify

name: livestock_crisis
label:
If "Yes, in raising livestock":
How has the current crisis affected your livestock activities, if at all?
constraint_message::English (en): the option "Production has not been negatively affected" can't be selected with other options

name: livestock_crisis_other
label: If other, Please specify

name: source_fish
label:
If "Yes, in fishing or fisheries":
What is the main source of your production or catch?

name: source_fish_other
label: If other, Please specify

name: fish_crisis
label:
If "Yes, in fishing or fisheries":
How has the current crisis affected your fishing or fishery activities, if at all?

name: fish_crisis_other
label: If other, Please specify

name: shelter
label: Shelter and NFI

name: access_mobile_network
label: Which mobile networks does your household currently have access to?
constraint: not(selected(., 'dk')) and not(selected(., 'dwta')) and not(selected(., 'no_access_mobile_network')) or count-selected(.) = 1
constraint_message::English (en): some options can't be selected with other options
hint::English (en): Please only select networks that the household is currently able to access through a functioning SIM card or mobile device

name: access_mobile_network_other
label: if other, please specify

name: dwelling_type
label: What type of shelter do you live in?

name: occupancy_type
label: How would you describe your household's occupancy status?
constraint_message::English (en): If public space or camp is selected above, the options ownership and renting cannot be selected

name: occupancy_type_other
label: Other:

name: dwelling_roster
label: How many rooms in your household's shelter are:

name: damaged_room
label: 1. Damaged?

name: undamaged_room
label: 2. Undamaged?

name: open_elements_room
label: 3. Open to the elements (e.g. broken or missing windows, holes in walls, etc.)?

name: shelter_condition
label: Question for enumerator: How would you describe the overall condition of this household's shelter? Please refer to the reference pictures below.
hint::English (en): Shelters that were damaged in the past but have been fully repaired should be coded as "No damage / negligible damage

name: threat_eviction
label: Has your household experienced eviction or the threat of eviction within the past 6 months?

name: eviction_reason
label: If yes: Why do you think your household was evicted / is being threatened with eviction?
relevant: not(selected(${occupancy_type},'owned') or selected(${occupancy_type},'dk') or selected(${occupancy_type},'dwta')) and (selected(${threat_eviction},'yes_threat_eviction') or selected(${threat_eviction},'recently_evicted'))
constraint: not(selected(., 'dk')) and not(selected(., 'dwta')) and count-selected(.) <= 3 or count-selected(.) = 1
constraint_message::English (en): some options can't be selected with other options

name: eviction_reason_other
label: Other:

name: first_electricity_source
label: What is the most common source of electricity used by your household?

name: first_electricity_source_other
label: Other:

name: second_electricity_source
label: What is the second most common source of electricity used by your household?
constraint_message::English (en): Answer must be different than the first common source of electricity

name: second_electricity_source_other
label: Other:

name: elec_cuts
label: Over the past 7 days, for how many hours per day, on average, has your household experienced power outages from the main network?
constraint_message::English (en): value between 0 and 24 hours
hint::English (en): Please include hours when the household has needed to run a generator due to a lack of electricity.

name: access_fuel
label: For each of the following types of fuel, is your household able to access sufficient fuel to meet its energy needs?

name: cooking_fuel
label: 1. Cooking fuel

name: vehicle_fuel
label: 2. Vehicle fuel

name: generator_fuel
label: 3. Generator fuel

name: heating_fuel
label: 4. Heating fuel

label: Does your household have access to a functional heating system in your own shelter during the winter?
constraint_message::English (en): some options can't be selected with other options

name: education
label: Education

name: children_education
label: school enrollement

name: nb_children_enrolled
label: How many school aged children (6-17) in your HH are enrolled in school?
constraint_message::English (en): The number specified here can't be higher than the number of persons under 18 in the household
hint::English (en): School-aged children = ages 6-17

name: male_enroll
label: males
constraint_message::English (en): The number specified here can't be higher than the number of persons enrolled in the school

name: female_enroll
label: females
constraint_message::English (en): The number specified here can't be higher than the number of persons enrolled in the school

name: nb_children_attending
label: How many of them have regularly attended school during the 2017-2018 academic year?
constraint_message::English (en): The number specified here can't be higher than the number of persons under 18 in the household
hint::English (en): "regularly" attending school: children who did not miss  more than 25% of school days

name: male_attend
label: males
constraint_message::English (en): The number specified here can't be higher than the number of male enrolled in the school

name: female_attend
label: females
constraint_message::English (en): The number specified here can't be higher than the number of female enrolled in the school

name: nb_children_enrolled_err
label: The sum of male and female children enrolled are different than the number entered above

name: nb_children_attending_err
label: The sum of male and female children attending school are different than the number entered above

name: reasons_noaccess_dropped_school
label: What are the most cited reasons for not regularly attending and/or dropping out of education services?
constraint_message::English (en): some options can't be selected with other options

name: reasons_noaccess_dropped_school_other
label: if other, please specify

name: type_nonformal_education
label: Are the children in your household attending any kind of non- formal (completely out of the formal/informal school system) education?
constraint: not(selected(.,'none')) and not(selected(.,'dk')) and not(selected(.,'dwta')) or count-selected(.) = 1
constraint_message::English (en): some options can't be selected with other options

name: type_nonformal_education_other
label: If other, specify

name: food_security_consent
label: Enumerator to explain:To be able to better monitor the food security situation in Libya,we are planning to conduct short surveys via mobile phone.If you were to participate, the phone survey would last approximately 10 minutes, and would focus on your familys food consumption, access to markets, work and social well-being. Any information collected would remain strictly confidential and anonymous.This information will help us understand the situation in your community.Any information collected would remain strictly confidential and anonymous. Would you be interested in participating?
